meanings.definition: To make something more attractive or beautiful.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys prettifying her room with colorful decorations.
meanings.sent2: The florist is prettifying the bouquet with ribbons and bows.
meanings.sent3: The cat was caught prettifying itself in front of the mirror.
meanings.sent4: Her smile prettifies her face like a ray of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush strokes prettify the canvas, bringing it to life.

meanings.definition: The act of improving the appearance of something.
meanings.sent1: Her prettifying of the garden made it a lovely place to relax.
meanings.sent2: The prettifying of the old building attracted more visitors.
meanings.sent3: The prettifying of the cake with icing turned it into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The prettifying of the town square transformed it into a charming gathering place.
meanings.sent5: The prettifying of the park with flowers created a colorful oasis in the city.
